function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between forest exposure and infection rates","Impact":"Lack of understanding of how forest exposure affects infection rates could lead to ineffective disease control measures.","Mitigation":"Further research on the relationship between forest exposure and infection rates is needed to inform disease control strategies.","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools can be used to analyze the association and predict infection rates based on forest exposure.","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers, and urban planners","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and government organizations"}]}
